title: President strongly condemns bomb blast in DI Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 3 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday strongly condemned the bomb blast that took place in Dera Ismail Khan which caused deaths and injuries.
The president expressed deep regret over the loss of precious human lives in the blast.
He prayed for the elevation of the ranks of the martyrs in paradise and speedy recovery for the injured.
He reiterated the countryâ€™s resolve to completely eradicate terrorism from its soil.
